00018 class ConnectionEvent;

00020 namespace Internal {
00021 
00022 typedef IVtdApi::ConnectionHandle ConnectionHandle;
00023 
00028 class NetworkHandler : public Com::CallbackIface, public sigslot::has_signals<NetworkHandler>
00029 {
00030 public:
00031     typedef Com::CallbackIface Base;
00032 
00033     static NetworkHandler* getInstance();
00034     virtual ~NetworkHandler();
00035 
00036     ConnectionHandle connect(const std::string& address, UInt port, VTD::IVtdApi::Protocol::Enum protocol);
00037 
00042     void disconnectSCP(ConnectionHandle& handle);
00043 
00048     void disconnectRDB(ConnectionHandle& handle);
00049 
00050     void update();
00051 
00052     bool writeRdb(const ConnectionHandle& handle, RDB_MSG_t* message);
00053     bool writeScp(const ConnectionHandle& handle, SCP_MSG_HDR_t* message, size_t totalSize);
00054     bool isConnected(const ConnectionHandle& handle);
00055 
00056     virtual void incomingPackage(const Com::NetPackage& netPkg, const std::string& partner) VTD_OVERRIDE;
00057 
00058     template<class T> void registerForRdb(T* obj, void (T::*function)(RDB_MSG_t*, size_t, const std::string&)) {
00059         rdbMessageSignal_.connect(obj, function);
00060     }
00061 
00062     template<class T> void registerForScp(T* obj, void (T::*function)(SCP_MSG_HDR_t*, void*, const std::string&)) {
00063         scpMessageSignal_.connect(obj, function);
00064     }
00065 
00066     template<class T> void registerForConnectionEvent(T* obj, void (T::*function)(ConnectionEvent*)) {
00067         connectionStateSignal_.connect(obj, function);
00068     }
00069 
00070 private:
00071     struct ConnectionState {
00072         bool isConnected;
00073     };
00074     typedef std::map<ConnectionHandle, ConnectionState> ConnectionStateMap;
00075 
00076     static Com::ComHandler* comHandler_;
00077     CriticalSection cs_;
00078     sigslot::signal<RDB_MSG_t*, size_t, const std::string&> rdbMessageSignal_;
00079     sigslot::signal<SCP_MSG_HDR_t*, void*, const std::string&> scpMessageSignal_;
00080     sigslot::signal<ConnectionEvent*> connectionStateSignal_;
00081     ConnectionStateMap scpConnectionStates_; 
00082 
00083     NetworkHandler();
00084 
00085     void handleSCPMessage(void* data, size_t size, const std::string& partner);
00086     void handleMessage(void* data, size_t size, int protocol,  const std::string& partner);
00087 
00088     static UInt generateHandle(const std::string& hostname, unsigned int port, VTD::IVtdApi::Protocol::Enum protocol);
00089 };
